author: Surfers of Bali
text:
March doesn't normally delivery big swells, but that's not a problem for a place like Canggu.

There's plenty of small fun days in this area, often with light winds in the third month of the year.

Here's a compilation of several sessions we filmed in March 2021.

Get your free digital Bali Surf Guide here: https://surfersofbali.com/pages/bali-surf-guide

SUBSCRIBE for daily surf videos: https://bit.ly/2Tu1Poz

FIND US HERE
Website: https://surfersofbali.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/surfersof
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/surfersofbali

#SurfingBali #Canggu #SurfingIndonesia
description:
If you're interested in surfing in Bali you'll probably like this channel.

Our single session videos are supposed to make you feel like you're there, sitting on the beach watching it all happen.

We also have some interviews in the form of our #Beached series as well as some longer videos that run up to 2 hours

author: Cj Kirwan
text: Anybody else do the wetsuit shimmy? 😂🕺 #surf #surfing #wetsuit
description:
Just a kid who loves to make videos. Hope you guys enjoy and stick around!

Staying active by doing the things I love 
Surfing 🏄‍♂️ Fitness 🏋️‍♂️ Pickleball 🏓

https://www.nbcolympics.com/surfing/tap-into-tahiti-2024

author: BARENA FILM & SPORTS
text:
On February 24th, 2024, was a HISTORIC day in Nazaré, Portugal. A battle for the Guinness World Record for the largest wave ever surfed took place. Two surfers in the sea attempting to ride waves over 100 feet tall on a stormy day at Praia do Norte, in front of hundreds of people who filled the cliff to witness a day that will go down in the books. 
Lucas Chumbo undoubtedly surfed waves that surpass the record already established in 2022 for the largest wave ever surfed. Now it is time to measure and officially confirm the size of the waves.

It has been over 5 years since Nazaré experienced a swell of such magnitude and under such conditions: a GIANT, STORMY, and WINDY sea with waves exceeding 100 feet. 
These conditions made catching waves of this size not only a challenging task but also a VERY DANGEROUS one... a matter of life or death! 

What do you think? Is there a new world record?

#bigwaves #worldrecord #surf
description:
¡SUSCRÍBETE PARA CONTENIDO ÚNICO DE NAZARÉ!
En Barena Film & Sports mostramos todo lo que sucede en Nazaré desde una perspectiva única, ¡nunca antes vista!
Te haremos viajar a Nazaré, Portugal, sin salir de tu casa. Te haremos sentir la adrenalina y el poder del océano. 
El poder de las olas más grandes del mundo!
